data.author: Manel Torrecilla

changelog.release_notes:
Time digital and analogic at the same time
The 12h indicator show the charge
Now for Aplite, Basalt & Chalk
solved problem with two digits month days

Solved the problem with PM/AM indicator.
Now, the point in the hour hand is orange on PM and blue in AM.

A simple circular watch. With hours, minutes and the month's day.
If you shake it you'll see the time in digits.
The circle color show the battery state:
white-yellow: 70% - 100%
green: 50% - 70%
orange: 30%-40%
red: <30%

Un simple reloj circular. Con horas, minutos y el día del mes.
Si lo sacudes verás el tiempo en dígitos.
El círculo de color muestra el estado de la batería:
amarillo-blanco: 70% - 100%
verde: 50% - 70%
naranja: 30% -40%
rojo: <30%

data.description:
A simple circular watch with time in digital and analogic. 
The 12h indicator show the charge
